source: TEXT_CLSWDK003_00141_SEQ_00<tab>Timbermaster Beatin needs a carpenter to assist one of his newest apprentices.
target: TEXT_CLSWDK003_00141_SEQ_00<tab>木工師ギルドのベアティヌは、冒険者に同僚の悩みの相談に乗ってもらいたいようだ。

source: TEXT_CLSWDK003_00141_SEQ_01<tab>Postponing your final test, Timbermaster Beatin asks you to assist one of the guild's newest members, an adventurer named Mera Pamera.
target: TEXT_CLSWDK003_00141_SEQ_01<tab>木工師ギルドの「メラ・パメラ」が悩みを抱えているようだ。彼に話を聞いてみよう。

source: TEXT_CLSWDK003_00141_SEQ_02<tab>The task of preparing a vast batch of oak lumber has overwhelmed fellow adventurer Mera Pamera. Hoping to escape Timbermaster Beatin's infamous wrath, he begs that you make an ash shortbow and a feathered harpoon in his stead, and deliver them to the Archers' and Lancers' Guilds, respectively.
target: TEXT_CLSWDK003_00141_SEQ_02<tab>オーク材の削り直しに勤しむメラ・パメラに代わり、槍術士ギルドと弓術士ギルドへ「<var 28 ((Item)) F2071F01 /var>」と「<var 28 ((Item)) F2076701 /var>」を納品しよう。

source: TEXT_CLSWDK003_00141_SEQ_03<tab>You deliver the items as requested and spare the Lalafellin carpenter-in-training a fate worse than death. Report back to Timbermaster Beatin.
target: TEXT_CLSWDK003_00141_SEQ_03<tab>メラ・パメラの依頼をこなすことができた。木工師ギルドの「ベアティヌ」に報告しよう。

source:
TEXT_CLSWDK003_00141_SEQ_04Timbermaster Beatin is not fooled by your efforts to give Mera Pamera the credit for your crafting, yet seems anything but displeased by your attempted deception. He subsequently reveals that the whole affair was in fact an improvised third trial intended to gauge your compassion. He congratulates you on completing your training and declares you a journeyman carpenter.

※The next carpenter quest will be available from Beatin upon reaching level 20.
target:
TEXT_CLSWDK003_00141_SEQ_04第三の試練とは「愛の試練」だった。それは、木工師ギルドの一員として木に愛を注ぎ、グリダニア都市民の眼鏡にかなう品を納品することだった。ベアティヌは、図らずも試練を達成した冒険者を、改めて木工師ギルドの一員として認めてくれたようだ。

※木工師のレベルが20以上になると、ベアティヌから次の木工師クエストを受注することができます。

source: TEXT_CLSWDK003_00141_SEQ_05<tab>
target: TEXT_CLSWDK003_00141_SEQ_05<tab>

source: TEXT_CLSWDK003_00141_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Mera Pamera.
target: TEXT_CLSWDK003_00141_TODO_00<tab>メラ・パメラと話す

source: TEXT_CLSWDK003_00141_TODO_01<tab>Deliver a feathered harpoon to Ywain.
target: TEXT_CLSWDK003_00141_TODO_01<tab><var 28 ((Item)) F2071F01 /var>を槍術士ギルドのイウェインに納品

source: TEXT_CLSWDK003_00141_TODO_02<tab>Deliver an ash shortbow to Luciane.
target: TEXT_CLSWDK003_00141_TODO_02<tab><var 28 ((Item)) F2076701 /var>を弓術士ギルドのルシアヌに納品

source: TEXT_CLSWDK003_00141_TODO_03<tab>Report to Beatin.
target: TEXT_CLSWDK003_00141_TODO_03<tab>木工師ギルドのベアティヌに報告

source: TEXT_CLSWDK003_00141_BEATINE_000_1<tab>Well met, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Your training as a carpenter is almost complete. Indeed, I had a splendid final test prepared for you.
target:
TEXT_CLSWDK003_00141_BEATINE_000_1さん、よく来ましたね。
今日こそはついに、最後の試練の時……。

source: TEXT_CLSWDK003_00141_BEATINE_000_2<tab>Alas, the plight of one of our guild's newer members demands my attention.
target:
TEXT_CLSWDK003_00141_BEATINE_000_2……と、言いたいところですが……
すみません……。
またしても別のお願いがあるのです。

source: TEXT_CLSWDK003_00141_BEATINE_000_3<tab>The boy's name is Mera Pamera, and he is an adventurer like you─though one of rather less promise.
target:
TEXT_CLSWDK003_00141_BEATINE_000_3あなたと同じ、冒険者の木工師ギルド員、
メラ・パメラさんが、何か非常に悩んでいるようです……。

source: TEXT_CLSWDK003_00141_BEATINE_000_4<tab>Something troubles the lad, yet he is loath to speak of personal matters with me─though I am the very <var 1A 02 /var>soul<var 1A 01 /var> of understanding, as you know...
target:
TEXT_CLSWDK003_00141_BEATINE_000_4私も、声はかけてみたのですが
私には事情を話したくないようなのです……。

source: TEXT_CLSWDK003_00141_BEATINE_000_5<tab>Mayhap you would fare better? I sense that he may be more inclined to speak with a fellow adventurer.
target:
TEXT_CLSWDK003_00141_BEATINE_000_5私、ちょっと悲しいのですが……
立場の近いさんだったら、
彼も話しやすいこともあるかもしれません……。

source: TEXT_CLSWDK003_00141_BEATINE_000_6<tab>Now go, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, and do not disappoint me.
target:
TEXT_CLSWDK003_00141_BEATINE_000_6もしよかったら今日は、彼の悩みを
聞いてあげてくれませんか……？

source: TEXT_CLSWDK003_00141_MERAPAMERA_000_10<tab>Gods strike me down for a fool! I'll never be able to finish in time!
target: TEXT_CLSWDK003_00141_MERAPAMERA_000_10<tab>ぐ、ぐぬぬぬぬ……

source: TEXT_CLSWDK003_00141_MERAPAMERA_000_11<tab>Please! You <var 1A 02 /var>must<var 1A 01 /var> help me!
target: TEXT_CLSWDK003_00141_MERAPAMERA_000_11<tab>たっ……頼む！

source: TEXT_CLSWDK003_00141_MERAPAMERA_000_12<tab>You can make ash shortbows and feathered harpoons, can't you!?
target:
TEXT_CLSWDK003_00141_MERAPAMERA_000_12お前……「」と
「」は作れるか！？

source: TEXT_CLSWDK003_00141_MERAPAMERA_000_13<tab>You see, I went and forgot that I had agreed to craft two weapons for the Archers' and Lancers' Guilds for delivery no later than, well...today.
target:
TEXT_CLSWDK003_00141_MERAPAMERA_000_13実は……僕、槍術士ギルドと、弓術士ギルドから
武器の納品を依頼されていることを
すっかり忘れていたんだ……。

source: TEXT_CLSWDK003_00141_MERAPAMERA_000_14<tab>But today I am <var 1A 02 /var>also<var 1A 01 /var> obligated to complete an order of <var 1A 02 /var>one hundred<var 1A 01 /var> lengths of oak lumber!
target:
TEXT_CLSWDK003_00141_MERAPAMERA_000_14でも今日中に、オーク材の削り直し
100本を終わらせなきゃいけなくて……

source: TEXT_CLSWDK003_00141_MERAPAMERA_000_15<tab>The point being that I can't possibly do both! And Timbermaster Beatin is a veritable <var 1A 02 /var>terror<var 1A 01 /var> when his wrath is on him! If I dare neglect either duty, he surely will not spare me his saw!
target:
TEXT_CLSWDK003_00141_MERAPAMERA_000_15もし依頼品をすっぽかしたら……
ベアティヌ先生を怒らせたらっ……
オーク材の代わりに、僕が製材されちゃう！

source: TEXT_CLSWDK003_00141_MERAPAMERA_000_16<tab>So...while I labor over this lumber, might you consent to craft the goods for the guilds?
target:
TEXT_CLSWDK003_00141_MERAPAMERA_000_16お願いだよ！
僕の代わりにと
を作って納品してくれ！

source: TEXT_CLSWDK003_00141_MERAPAMERA_000_17<tab>Thank you! ...Oh, and when you've finished them, I'd appreciate it if you could deliver the weapons to the relevant guildmasters. Godsspeed!
target:
TEXT_CLSWDK003_00141_MERAPAMERA_000_17納品先は、槍術士ギルドマスターのイウェインと、
弓術士ギルドマスターのルシアヌだ！
頼んだぞ！

source: TEXT_CLSWDK003_00141_YWAIN_000_20<tab>Well met, adventurer. You do not seem to be here for training...
target:
TEXT_CLSWDK003_00141_YWAIN_000_20木工師ギルドに依頼した、
「」の納品を待っているんだ。

source: TEXT_CLSWDK003_00141_YWAIN_000_21<tab>Ah, the feathered harpoon! My thanks for the delivery.
target:
TEXT_CLSWDK003_00141_YWAIN_000_21ああ、「」か！
注文どおりの品だ、ありがとよ。

source: TEXT_CLSWDK003_00141_YWAIN_000_22<tab>Had we not received it in time, I was considering using a fisherman's harpoon instead.
target:
TEXT_CLSWDK003_00141_YWAIN_000_22納品が間に合わなかったら、
槍の代わりに、漁師が忘れてった「銛」でも
使おうかと思っていたところだ。

source: TEXT_CLSWDK003_00141_YWAIN_000_23<tab>You seem surprised. I take it you are not aware that the harpoons we use in battle were born of the humble fisherman's tool?
target:
TEXT_CLSWDK003_00141_YWAIN_000_23ああ、知らなかったか？
「ハープーン」ってのは元々、
漁師が使う「銛」から生まれたんだ。

source: TEXT_CLSWDK003_00141_YWAIN_000_24<tab>Aye, when Hyuran fishers migrated inland from the coasts, they adapted the tools of their trade for use in the hunting of game.
target:
TEXT_CLSWDK003_00141_YWAIN_000_24海辺の地域から移住してきたヒューラン族が、
森での猟に使うために改良したのが、
ハープーンの始まりだという。

source: TEXT_CLSWDK003_00141_YWAIN_000_25<tab>The resulting harpoon proved a fearsome weapon indeed, and so the lancers of old took it for their own. Hard to believe, is it not?
target:
TEXT_CLSWDK003_00141_YWAIN_000_25それが今では、森を守る鬼哭隊の重要な武器だ。
面白いこともあるもんだな。

source: TEXT_CLSWDK003_00141_YWAIN_000_26<tab>I must say, this harpoon is a particularly impressive piece of craftsmanship. My compliments to the carpenter.
target:
TEXT_CLSWDK003_00141_YWAIN_000_26あんたが持ってきた、
中々よくできてやがる。
ありがたく使わせてもらうぜ。

source: TEXT_CLSWDK003_00141_LUCIANE_000_30<tab>Welcome, adventurer. To what do we owe the pleasure?
target:
TEXT_CLSWDK003_00141_LUCIANE_000_30木工師ギルドに依頼した、
「」の納品を待っているのよ。

source: TEXT_CLSWDK003_00141_LUCIANE_000_31<tab>Is this the ash shortbow we ordered? Thank you for delivering it.
target:
TEXT_CLSWDK003_00141_LUCIANE_000_31あら、「」の納品ね。
ご苦労さま。

source: TEXT_CLSWDK003_00141_LUCIANE_000_32<tab>One of our Miqo'te recruits has been struggling, lest you wonder. Talented though she is, the longbow we furnished her with does not suit a Miqo'te's shorter arms and slighter frame.
target:
TEXT_CLSWDK003_00141_LUCIANE_000_32新入りのミコッテ族の者が、弓を傷めてしまってね。
「」でなければ、
手に馴染まない……と言うのよ。

source: TEXT_CLSWDK003_00141_LUCIANE_000_33<tab>But I daresay this shortbow─with its lighter draw weight and more modest span─should help her reach her true potential.
target:
TEXT_CLSWDK003_00141_LUCIANE_000_33は、
小ぶりの短弓で、取り回しも良好。
それゆえに、とても素早く矢を放てるの。

source: TEXT_CLSWDK003_00141_LUCIANE_000_34<tab>Indeed, shortbows not unlike this were favored by her ancestors. And some things never change.
target:
TEXT_CLSWDK003_00141_LUCIANE_000_34小柄ですばしっこい狩猟民族、
ミコッテ族にはうってつけの弓ということよ。

source: TEXT_CLSWDK003_00141_LUCIANE_000_35<tab>It is clear to me that a great deal of care went into this shortbow's construction. I will see that our recruit spares no effort in making the most of this boon.
target:
TEXT_CLSWDK003_00141_LUCIANE_000_35あなたのお持ちになった
このショートボウ、とてもよい出来ね。
これで、彼女も鍛錬に励むことができるわ。ありがとう。

source: TEXT_CLSWDK003_00141_BEATINE_000_40<tab>How kind of you to assist Mera Pamera with the orders. The guildmasters spoke highly of <var 1A 02 /var>your<var 1A 01 /var> craftsmanship as well. This is very good.
target:
TEXT_CLSWDK003_00141_BEATINE_000_40メラさんに……話は聞きました……。
メラさんの仕事を手伝ってくださったようですね……。

source: TEXT_CLSWDK003_00141_BEATINE_000_41<tab>Do not attempt to mislead me. I know full well it was your work. Needless to say, it was necessary to punish the Lalafell. Ah...I seem to spend more time sawing apprentices than wood of late.
target:
TEXT_CLSWDK003_00141_BEATINE_000_41メラさんは、お仕置きとして……
オークチップのようにバラバラに製材しておきましたよ……。

source: TEXT_CLSWDK003_00141_BEATINE_000_42<tab>...I jest, of course. A saw is wasted on an apprentice. The stink of blood lingers, making it hard to focus on work. This, I <var 1A 02 /var>know<var 1A 01 /var>.
target:
TEXT_CLSWDK003_00141_BEATINE_000_42フフフ……フフフフフ……
先生の木工ジョークですよ……。

source: TEXT_CLSWDK003_00141_BEATINE_000_43<tab>I will admit, I was not ignorant of Mera Pamera's situation.
target:
TEXT_CLSWDK003_00141_BEATINE_000_43それにしても、さん。
驚くべき偶然……運がよいですね。

source: TEXT_CLSWDK003_00141_BEATINE_000_44<tab>In fact, I recognized an opportunity to test your character.
target:
TEXT_CLSWDK003_00141_BEATINE_000_44実は、第三の試練は……
「愛の試練」……。

source: TEXT_CLSWDK003_00141_BEATINE_000_45<tab>You aided your fellow carpenter with no prospect of reward, delivering finely crafted goods when merely serviceable ones would have sufficed. And you claimed no credit.
target:
TEXT_CLSWDK003_00141_BEATINE_000_45それは……ここ、木工師ギルドの一員として、
木材への愛……敬意を示すこと。

source: TEXT_CLSWDK003_00141_BEATINE_000_46<tab>I am proud of you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. There is no doubt in my mind that your talents will serve the nation of Gridania well, and save many lives.
target:
TEXT_CLSWDK003_00141_BEATINE_000_46グリダニアは、木に囲まれた都市。
みな、木々への愛情には……とても敏感です。

source: TEXT_CLSWDK003_00141_BEATINE_000_47<tab>Just as they will bring about many deaths. This is the responsibility of all who make weapons.
target:
TEXT_CLSWDK003_00141_BEATINE_000_47もしも、槍術士ギルドのイウェインさんや、
弓術士ギルドのルシアヌさんに、
不出来な武器を納品していたら……

source: TEXT_CLSWDK003_00141_BEATINE_000_48<tab>But a choice between the deaths of our people and the deaths of our enemies is no choice at all.
target:
TEXT_CLSWDK003_00141_BEATINE_000_48今頃、あのふたりの強豪に……
あちこち突き刺されてたことでしょう……
……フフフフフ。

source: TEXT_CLSWDK003_00141_BEATINE_000_49<tab>You have passed the third and final test. Congratulations, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>.
target:
TEXT_CLSWDK003_00141_BEATINE_000_49さて……
今までの試練をおさらいしてみましょうか。

source: TEXT_CLSWDK003_00141_BEATINE_000_50<tab>By your actions you have demonstrated your understanding of what it means to know the wood, be the wood, and to love the wood.
target:
TEXT_CLSWDK003_00141_BEATINE_000_50まず「木を知る試練」……次に「力を与える試練」……
そして最後に、「愛の試練」……。

source: TEXT_CLSWDK003_00141_BEATINE_000_51<tab>You possess the knowledge, skill, and compassion necessary to master carpentry.
target:
TEXT_CLSWDK003_00141_BEATINE_000_51「木を知り」、その木材に「力を与え」……
職人としての責任をもって、「愛」を注ぐ……。
そう、これが木工師ギルドの心得です。

source: TEXT_CLSWDK003_00141_BEATINE_000_52<tab>By overcoming these trials, you have proven that you are no longer a novice. The sapling is well on its way to becoming a tree.
target:
TEXT_CLSWDK003_00141_BEATINE_000_52この3つの試練を越えたさんは
もう、新芽ではなく、自立した1本の木です……。

source: TEXT_CLSWDK003_00141_BEATINE_000_53<tab>You are now a true carpenter of the Oak Atrium.
target:
TEXT_CLSWDK003_00141_BEATINE_000_53見習い試練はこれで完了です。
よく頑張りましたね……。

source: TEXT_CLSWDK003_00141_BEATINE_000_54<tab>Know, though, that however refined your skills may be, there will always be more to learn. Represent us well on your travels, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, and return to us often. You shall always be welcome.
target:
TEXT_CLSWDK003_00141_BEATINE_000_54これからは……立派なギルドの一員として……
共に、さらなる成長をしていきましょう……。
